version.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the endpoint last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the endpoint

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering endpoints, if necessary. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.

chassis_id.description: Chasis id of the endpoint. LLDP is one way the chassid id should be passed to the network. For virtual system it can be null.

anyOf.description: When the Chassis ID is a MAC address, use this format
When the Chassis ID is anything other than a MAC address, a freeform string may be used
When the Chassis ID is unavailable it should be set to null

port_id.description: Port ID of the endpoint. Similar to chassis-id, it can be advertised in LLDP/ARP from the endpoint. Must be a MAC address

mgmt_ip.description: Unique management IP address for the device. If provided, IP address must uniquely identify the network device.

mac_address.description: Unique mac address for the device. If provided, mac-address must uniquely identify the network device.

interface.description: Network device interface or switch interface. If not provided, it's assumed to be discovered using other protocols or out of band.
